channel.title: OnOptions
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from OnOptions, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Elon Musk’s AI Chatbot Grok Faces Investigation Over Sexual Deepfakes
item.description: The EU opened an investigation after Grok spewed nonconsensual sexualized deepfake images on the platform.

item.title: Why Your Business Needs an Origin Story
item.description: What if—in two hours—you could create one document that powers every speech, marketing campaign, and sales conversation for the next decade?

item.title: Videos of deadly Minneapolis shooting contradict Trump administration’s claims, experts say
item.description: Leaders of law enforcement organizations expressed alarm Sunday over the latest deadly shooting by federal officers in Minneapolis while use-of-force ...

item.title: Trump knows who to blame for 2 American citizen deaths in Minnesota: ‘Democrat ensued chaos’
item.description: Trump refused to back away from his pledge to carry out the largest deportation program in history.

item.title: A 1982 bourbon just became the most expensive American Whiskey ever sold
item.description: The most expensive bottle of American whiskey ever sold at auction is no longer a dusty pre-Prohibition relic or a museum-grade antique. It’s a 1982 b...

item.title: A crypto social media network’s failure raises an awkward question: Is blockchain good for anything beside finance?
item.description: Some blame Farcaster’s flop on its leadership team, but its challenges went much deeper.

item.title: Why the European Union is launching a probe into Elon Musk’s Grok chatbot
item.description: The European Union opened a formal investigation into Elon Musk’s social media platform X on Monday after his artificial intelligence chatbot Grok spe...

item.title: Yes, you’re getting a bigger tax refund. Your kids won’t thank you for the $3 trillion it’s adding to the deficit
item.description: I'm the president and CEO of the Tax Foundation. We expect 71% of taxes to be paid by the top 20% of earners in 2026.

item.title: Gold just hit a major milestone. Is silver next?
item.description: On Sunday, the price of gold hit a major milestone: it surpassed the $5,000-per-ounce mark for the first time in history. But while gold’s price rise ...

item.title: Republican groundswell for ICE investigation grows after second killing of American citizen in Minnesota
item.description: Alex Pretti's killing comes at a sensitive moment for the GOP as the party prepares for a challenging midterm election year.

item.title: Super Bowl 60 is set: Patriots vs. Seahawks, a rematch from 11 years ago
item.description: Drake Maye vs. Sam Darnold. Two stingy defenses. A second-year head coach vs. a veteran coach in his second act. Super Bowl 60 is set and it’s a remat...

item.title: 5 Rules I Had to Learn the Hard Way
item.description: Scaling a business without breaking it is not easy.

item.title: Rising Health Premiums Push More Small Businesses to Drop Coverage
item.description: More people are eligible for healthcare insurance through work, but a new study shows many companies say costs are too high to offer it.

item.title: How to Protect Your Staff as the EEOC Backs off Earlier Harassment Guidelines
item.description: The Equal Employment Opportunity Commission is in charge of enforcing anti-discrimination laws, but says it’s shrinking its mandate after a recent exe...

item.title: The quiet erosion of HR’s power
item.description: HR seems to be losing jurisdiction over the workforce in the age of AI.
